column5: My place is close to restaurants and dining, family-friendly activities, and art and culture. My place is good for solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets). I also have a hair stylist living here, at your convenience. Location is 15 minutes from downtown Austin. SXSW goers welcome !!! We have 3 rooms open and not all of them will be booked at the same time so please don't hesitate to ask for availability!! Also please include the number of guests that will be with you.
